description:
Survived the "World`s End" (that happened over 500 years ago) and currently he is the one and ONLY human in the world. In his "previous life" ex-hero, who currently left with no power to do any fighting at all. Becomes a caretaker for military facility he knows nothing about (partly just to pay off his debt faster).
Likes kids for their innocence and able to properly take care of them as he was once a "father" figure in the orphanage he lived in.
name: Willem Kmetsch
